message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1750000. It's a valuable asset that's worth every penny, and I'm confident it will be a great investment for you. Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1400000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to make sure it's a good deal for me.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $1400000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product for $1600000. This is a fair price that reflects the value of the product. I'm confident it will be a profitable investment for you.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $1550000, but I think that's as high as I can go. Can you consider this offer?
